newsitem.title: UK: LEP names U.S., Canadian executives.
newsitem.headline: LEP names U.S., Canadian executives.

text.p: UK global freight forwarder, LEP International said Joe Monaghan has joined U.S.-based LEP Profit International as executive vice-president, sales and general manager.
At the same time, Philip Wood has joined LEP Profit as vice president global logistics, high technology industries, a statement said.
Wood will focus on global supply chain management for high technology clients and he will also be responsible for developing and keeping LEP Profit's business with complex global customers, it added.

Both Monaghan and Wood were previously with Fritz Co. Monaghan as executive director with responsibility for Asia, the Middle East, Europe and Latin America, while Wood was director global high technology sales, the LEP statement said.
It added that Peter Schwerdt, who has been with the company since 1990, has been made president of LEP Canada. - Reuters Air Cargo Newsroom Tel+44 171 542 7706 Fax:5017
